page.title: 10CLUBS IN SPETISBURY & C. M.
page.content: Spetisbury and Charlton Marshall combine for most activities. Spetisbury First School caters for all children 5-9years. Brownies, Cubs and Guides meet at the School. The Youth Club and the Playgroup use Spetisbury Village Hall, but both attract members from both villages. There is a Mother & Toddler Club in each village. Cedar Hall in Charlton is the venue for Wednesday Wives meetings, Table Tennis Club and Charlton Theatre Productions. Older residents meet at Charlton's Monday Club. Other clubs are the Cricket Club, W.I.,Vintage Vehicles. Anglers, Wildlife, Sewing Circle, and Spetisbury Occasional Dramatic Society The village churches also organise activities.
